Title: 41787 - # Reasons Why a Small Business Needs to Keep Meticulous Records
Direction: 675 words. Write about 4 to 8 reasons why a small business needs to keep their paperwork in perfect order. Paperwork is a large part of any operation, and it's something that sometimes gets neglected in the rush to keep up with orders. It's important to maintain excellent records. A business sometimes has to produce information to government agencies, local regulatory bodies, and even customers to show that work was done in a timely manner and in the preferred method. Title: 41790 - # Reasons Why Keeping Track of Inventory is Important to a Small Business
Direction: 675 words. Write about 4 to 8 reasons why keeping track of inventory is so important. Small businesses need to know what they have on stock and quickly. It helps keep the business nimble and customers satisfied. Paper inventory tracking is prone to catastrophic failure, especially because it's hard to backup. Using software and simple data entry regimens means that everyone gets real-time updates of what's in stock, what's running low, and what needs to be reordered. Consider linking the target URL in a sentence that discusses the importance of software that's easy to use for all, ensuring that users won't put off entering fresh data when necessary. Your target audience is small business owners.
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: Sage 50 accounting is easy to use
